about.title: About
about.subtitle: My passion is helping people reach their maximum potential through fitness and personalized nutrition.
about.intro1: I'm Sabina Meruță, founder of SMfit and internationally certified personal trainer (Level 4 and Level 2) with over 2 years of experience in transforming my clients' bodies and lives.
about.intro2: I believe every person deserves a unique, personalized approach built on solid training and nutrition principles, continuously adapted to achieve the best results. My goal is to support you on your journey to a healthier, stronger, and more confident version of yourself.
about.philosophyIntro: My philosophy is based on several fundamental principles:

personalization.title: Personalization
personalization.description: Each person is unique, with different needs, limitations, and goals. That's why all my programs are 100% personalized for each individual client.

scientific.title: Scientific Approach
scientific.description: I base my methods on current scientific research and proven methods, not on passing trends or "miracle solutions". Efficiency and safety are priorities.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description: I believe in sustainable changes, not temporary solutions. My goal is to help you develop long-term healthy habits, not just get quick results that don't last.

education.title: Education
education.description: Beyond workouts and nutrition plans, I aim to educate you about your body and help you understand why we do certain exercises or make certain food choices.
